name: House Explore - Hidden Objects
description:
There's a secret lurking in the corners of this kitchen. A dark horror only you can uncover! House Explore - Hidden Objects is a seek and find puzzle game that hands you a chef hat and sends you through the darkest, scariest house in the world. There's no time to start cooking food, you've got puzzles to solve and secrets to uncover!

Features:
- A challenging hidden object game that takes place in a dark House.
- Food items to find, chef secrets to uncover, and cooking puzzles to solve.
- Three different game modes to play, including timed levels.
